item.description:
If weather is nice, let's play 9 holes sometime in the afternoon. I will book tee times later. Please note that last year we went there, they only accepted cash for green fee.

Additional info - This is a relatively easy course. So newbies are welcome. And yes, it is Easter Sunday. And the $1 is meetup fee. Each person pays one's own green fee in the club house.

Let's meet at 1:15 in front of the club house. I reserved 4 tee times btw 1:30 and 2:00. Please plan to arrive early. Please also email me your cell phone number if you didn't give it to me last year. Thx. See you guys soon.

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: April 4th - Pine Meadows in Lexington MA - 9 hole course
